name: Manasuli Premium Sona Monsuli Rice
description: Premium quality Sona Monsuli rice from Manasuli brand. Known for its aromatic fragrance and excellent cooking quality. Perfect for daily meals and special occasions.

name: Manasuli Premium Katarni Rice
description: High-quality Katarni rice variety from Manasuli Premium collection. Long grain rice with excellent taste and nutritional value.

name: Manasuli Premium Jeera Masina Rice
description: Premium Jeera Masina rice with distinctive aroma and flavor. Small grain variety perfect for traditional Nepali dishes.

name: Surayadaya Premium Sona Monsuli Rice
description: Premium Sona Monsuli rice from Surayadaya brand. Carefully processed and packed to maintain freshness and quality.

name: Surayadaya Premium Katarni Rice
description: Superior quality Katarni rice from Surayadaya Premium range. Long grain rice with excellent cooking properties.

name: Surayadaya Premium Jeera Masina Rice
description: Aromatic Jeera Masina rice from Surayadaya Premium collection. Traditional variety with authentic taste and fragrance.

name: Local Chamal - Traditional White Rice
description: Authentic local chamal (rice) grown by local farmers. Traditional variety with natural taste and high nutritional value.

name: Local Chamal - Red Rice
description: Nutritious red rice variety from local farmers. Rich in antioxidants and fiber, perfect for health-conscious consumers.

name: Premium Rice Bhus (Bran)
description: High-quality rice bran (bhus) perfect for animal feed and organic farming. Rich in nutrients and fiber.

name: Organic Rice Bhus
description: Organic rice bran from naturally grown rice. Excellent for livestock feed and organic gardening applications.

name: Premium Kanika (Broken Rice)
description: High-quality broken rice (kanika) perfect for making traditional dishes, porridge, and animal feed.

name: Fine Kanika (Small Broken Rice)
description: Fine quality small broken rice ideal for making rice flour, baby food, and traditional sweets.
